_header: Half in despair not half but clean dispaired
_description: The lover gets disgusted with Love’s tribulations by Charles d’Orléans — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
HAlf in dispeyre not half but clene dispeyridI take my leue of loue
                    for onys and ay…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…As y haue bene for whiche allas y sayThat evir y knew loue or
                    his servise
